text: I usually like older music (like classic rock, not old-old), but the gaming industry has had great and stinky tracks throughout. Pretty sure the guy who wrote the music for Dustforce was a young untrained man and that stuff is awesome!

text:
Omg this game! The salesman sold to my dad saying "its saint seiya" you can imagine my face when I playied it! (he though it was because of the in-game armor or something)
I hated it at first then it grew really fast on me, the gameplay is awesome and so the vgm, I really like the boss theme, it gets old fast but you cant imagine the feel when it firsts plays, great add supra!
